\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
    {P_i } \& {\varinjlim^{fil}P_\bullet} \& F \& K \\
    {P_i \oplus Q_i} \& {\varinjlim^{fil}P_\bullet \oplus Q_\bullet } \& P \&\& {P_i \oplus Q_i} \& {P_i} \\
    K \&\&\&\& P \& F
    \arrow["{f_i}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
    \arrow["{\sim }", equals, from=1-2, to=1-3]
    \arrow["{\alpha _i}", from=1-4, to=2-5]
    \arrow["{(\alpha _i, 0)}", curve={height=-12pt}, from=1-4, to=2-6]
    \arrow["{\alpha }"', curve={height=18pt}, from=1-4, to=3-5]
    \arrow["{(1,0)}", two heads, from=2-1, to=1-1]
    \arrow["{g_i}", from=2-1, to=2-2]
    \arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=1-2]
    \arrow["q", from=2-2, to=2-3]
    \arrow[two heads, from=2-3, to=1-3]
    \arrow["{(1,0)}"', from=2-5, to=2-6]
    \arrow["{q\circ g_i}"', from=2-5, to=3-5]
    \arrow["{f_i}", from=2-6, to=3-6]
    \arrow["{\alpha _i}", from=3-1, to=2-1]
    \arrow["{\alpha }"{description}, from=3-1, to=2-2]
    \arrow["0"', curve={height=12pt}, from=3-1, to=2-3]
    \arrow[two heads, from=3-5, to=3-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
